title: Action Bronson Joins the Show!
description:
Jalen & Jacoby recap the night of hoops. Luka drops 45 in a loss, but what’s his ceiling in the playoffs, and the biggest thing James Harden is missing vs the Heat. THEN, Action Bronson stops by to explain what happened with his cracked tooth that forced him to miss a show. PLUS, what he thinks the Knicks should do this offseason, and what’s up with his new album Cocodrillo Turbo. All that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
